org.bytedeco.javacv

Class FFmpegFrameFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacv.FrameFilter
      • org.bytedeco.javacv.FFmpegFrameFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class FFmpegFrameFilter
extends FrameFilter
    A FrameFilter that uses FFmpeg to filter frames. We can refer to FFmpeg Filters Documentation to get a list of filters and the options we can use. The input image width and height must be specified on the constructor, while other optional values may be set via corresponding properties.
    Author:
    Samuel Audet
